title: Construction Indonesia 2025 Expands Focus on Building Materials and Technology
body: Construction Indonesia 2025, marking its 25th anniversary, will be held from September 10-13, 2025, at Jakarta International Expo, featuring a broader focus on building materials, technology, and sustainable solutions alongside the Concrete Show South East Asia. The event aims to foster collaboration among industry players, with a projected stable economic growth of 4.9% in Indonesia, and will showcase innovations like smart building technologies and modular construction methods, addressing the growing infrastructure and housing demands of a population of 284.44 million.
